data.title: The Brendan Duffy Quartet
data.text:
One of the most charismatic and popular entertainers on the UK jazz scene on sax and vocals.

Accompanied by the astonishing Tom Townsend on drums, local favourite Christian Topman on double bass and the hardest-working pianist in York, Karl Mullen on upright piano, hold onto your hats for an eclectic and exciting cabaret of jazz through the ages. Everything from Louis Armstrong and singalong fun to John Coltrane and Charles Mingus!

This show is part of The Old Paint Shop Season in our Studio

Seating for this show will be in cabaret style and unreserved so be sure to grab your seats early and get a drink at the bar!
